requirements.summary: Replace the specified post-login splash message string in the fixed splash message pool with the new provided text, without changing any other messages or behavior.
acceptanceCriteria: The string "Document. Report. Prosecute. Repeat." no longer appears in POST_LOGIN_SPLASH_MESSAGES.
The post-login splash screen can display the new message "Pervert. Stalker. Loser. Typical man." as one of the randomized splash messages.
No other splash messages are changed.

file_operations.description: In POST_LOGIN_SPLASH_MESSAGES, replace the exact string "Document. Report. Prosecute. Repeat." with "Pervert. Stalker. Loser. Typical man." and do not change any other lines/messages or the randomization function.
